name: iDaft Jamming
description:
iDaft Jamming is a tribute to Daft Punk’s “Harder Better Faster Stronger”, "Technologic" and "Robot Rock"

Make your own jam sessions in the "jamming modes"!

Choose whether you want to jam along to the beat or just go plain "acapella".

Try the game modes:
- Guitar Hero style: Be a Daft Hero and nail those buttons!!!
- "Beat Box" with Robot Rock: Avoid the obstacles by tapping to the beat of Robot Rock.


Join the Facebook page "iDaft Jamming" and share your experiences!

Have fun!


(Daft Punk or their record label is not in any way affiliated with this app)
